item.description:
Enjoy a delicious dinner at the Rainforest Cafe surrounded by noisy animals, beautiful fish tanks and a fun atmosphere. Then afterwards, have fun building a bear together.


Come to this enjoyable time and it will be a wonderful adventurous meetup :-)


Hope to see you there.




**I would like for everyone to RSVP, by a week before this date so I can make reservations.
Weekends are busy so I can't make an actual dinner or lunch time until I make reservations for it but if your free that day I really hope you can join in.**

~Thank you~

****MY NUMBER IS 203 556 6130, IF THERE'S ANY PROBLEMS :-) ****




Rainforest Cafe - Farmington - West Farms Mall
500 Westfarms Mall
Farmington, CT 06032
(860) 521-2002
item.name: Rainforest Cafe and Build a Bear :-)
